response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend an offer to purchase this item for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic negotiation aimed at achieving a mutually beneficial transaction while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to achieve our financial goals. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any flexibility you'd consider in terms of price or conditions. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
